duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform financial analysis of business performance looking for trends in facilities spend and performance.
Work collaboratively with cross functional teams to gather data and provide insights in facilities and construction spend analysis.
Develop and produce weekly and monthly scorecard reporting used by Senior Management to drive business performance.
Provide regular financial analysis and presentations of P&L results for leadership team and private equity ownership team.
Provide insights as to the business drivers of changes in Facilities R&M, Capital Expenditures, and New Store Project budgets.
Develop and produce reporting for Field Operations and the facilities team to help identify store level opportunities for improvement with regards to facilities and Capital Projects.
Assist in tracking and highlighting financial performance and investment returns for new stores.
Think critically about Facilities and Construction processes to drive automation, efficiency, accuracy and other improvements.
Complete analyses in support of ad-hoc and strategic projects.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
